name: Monitor subscriptions
description: Allow the user to monitor subscriptions and view subscription details.

name: Monitor caches
description: Allow the user to view the count, browse and detail information of all Report & Document caches.

name: Monitor cluster
description: Allow the user to do cluster monitoring operations such as viewing the current cluster configuration.

name: Create and edit database instances and connections
description: Allow the user to create and edit database instances and database connections.

name: Create and edit schedules and events
description: Allow the user to create and edit schedules and events.

name: Monitor project
description: Allow the user to view the run-time state of a project.

name: Bypass schema objects security access checks
description: This is the privilege required to bypass access checks on any schema object.

name: View ETL information
description: Allow the user to view ETL information.

name: Use Report Objects Window
description: Allow the user to use the Report Objects Window.

name: Use Thresholds Editor
description: Allow the user to use the Thresholds Editor.

name: Use Formatting Editor
description: Allow the user to use the Formatting Editor.

name: Save custom autostyle
description: Allow the user to save custom AutoStyle.

name: Use View Filter Editor
description: Allow the user to use the Report Filter Editor.

name: Create Derived Metrics
description: Allow the user to create and edit the definition of Derived Metrics.

name: Modify Report subtotals
description: Allow the user to modify Report subtotals.

name: Modify the list of Report objects (use object browser)
description: Allow the user to modify the list of Report object.

name: Web create Derived Metrics and Derived Attributes
description: Allow the web user to create Derived Metrics and Derived Attributes.

name: Web modify subtotals
description: Allow the user to modify subtotals.

name: Web modify the list of Report Objects (use object browser -- all objects)
description: Allow the user to modify the list of Report objects.

name: Web use Report Objects Window
description: Allow the user to access Report objects window.

name: Create and edit transmitters and devices
description: Allow user to create & edit transmitters and devices.

name: Configure contacts data security profile
description: Allow user to link and unlink contacts for the purpose of defining data security
